Characteristic describing information on how to contact an organization
Characteristic of the technical key of a thoroughfare
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Characteristic for defining a thoroughfare which can consist of a type (e.g. "STREET"), value (e.g. "Bernstraße") and number (e.g. "45"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.
Characteristic of the technical key of a locality
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Characteristic for defining a locality which belongs to an address and which consists of a type (e.g. "CITY") and value (e.g. "Mannheim"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.
Characteristic of the technical key of a premise
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Characteristic for defining a premise which consists of a technical key (e.g. "BUILDING" or "OTHER") and a value (e.g. "Werk 1").

aas:displayName.aas:langString: Postal Delivery Point Technical Key Characteristic

IEC61360:definition.IEC61360:langString: Characteristic of the technical key of a postal delivery point
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Characteristic for defining a postal delivery point which consists of a technical key (e.g. "MAILBOX" or "OTHER") and a value. Model follows the specification of BPDM.
Characteristic of a country belonging to an address
Characteristic for the technical key of a post code
Characteristic for defining a postcode which can consist of a type (e.g. "REGULAR" for zip codes) and a value (e.g. "68161\12"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.
A characteristic to express the postal adress and which is intended to be referenced by other aspects
A manufacturer of goods

Power capability in Watts
The decrease over time and upon usage in the amount of power that a battery can deliver at the rated voltage is describing a regulatory requirement.
Power capability in Watts
Power capability in Watts
A measurement for the power of the battery.
A measurement for the power of the battery.
Characterisitic to describe the power (W) properties of the batterie.
Value of the voltage the battery is rated for
Value of the voltage the battery is rated for
Value of the voltage the battery is rated for
Characterisitic to describe the voltage (V) properties of the batterie.
The total number of ampere-hours (Ah) that can be withdrawn from a fully charged battery under specific conditions is describing a regulatory requirement.

The decrease over time and upon usage in the amount of charge that a battery can deliver at the rated voltage, with respect to the original rated capacity declared by the manufacturer is describing a regulatory requirement.
The resistance offered by the cell in the flow of the current
Total internal resistance in a battery pack
Increase in internal resistance of a battery pack over a period of time
Internal resistance in a battery cell or pack is describing a regulatory requirement.
Capacity threshold for exhaustion as percentage value is describing a regulatory requirement.
Characterisitic to describe the energy (Wh) properties of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement.
Round-trip efficiency is the percentage of electricity put into storage is describing a regulatory requirement.
Round-trip efficiency is the percentage of electricity put into storage after 50% of life of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement.
Characterisitic to describe the energy (kWh) properties of the batterie.

Entity of an address. Model follows specification of BPDM (Business Partner Data Management).
Entity for a thoroughfare which consists of a type, value and number.
Technical key of a thoroughfare. As specified by BPDM, this can be a "STREET" or a different type.
Value of a thoroughfare, e.g. name of a street.
Number of a thoroughfare. As used differently in international context, this number can contain both numerical and alphanumerical values
Entity for a thoroughfare which consists of a type, value and number.
Technical key of a locality
Value of a locality, e.g. name of a city ("Mannheim").
Entity for a premise which consists of a type (technical key) and a value
Technical key of a premise
Value of a premise, e.g. name or designation of a particular site
Entity for a postal delivery point which consists of a technical key and a value.
Technical key of a postal delivery point
Value of a postal delivery point, e.g. designation of a gate
Entity definition for a country
Entity for a postcode which consists of a type plus a value
The value of a post code
The technical key of a post code
Entity encapsulating the electrochemical details of a battery
Entity to bundle the power properties of a battery.
Maximum allowed battery power (W) of the battery is describing a business requirement.
Original power capability in Watts is describing a regulatory requirement.
Maximum allowed battery power (W) of the battery is describing a business requirement.
Power (capability) at 20% state of charge. Description from the Regulation is describing a regulatory requirement.
Power (capability) at 80% state of charge. Description from the Regulation is describing a regulatory requirement.
Performance ability of the high voltage battery i.e. the amount of energy that a battery is capable to provide over a given period of time is describing a regulatory requirement.
Performance ability of the high voltage battery according to limits i.e. how much power it can provide within given limits is describing a regulatory requirement.
Entity to bundle the voltage properties of a battery.
Value of the minimal voltage the battery is rated for is describing a regulatory requirement.
Value of the nominal voltage the battery is rated for is describing a regulatory requirement.
Value of the maximum voltage the battery is rated for is describing a regulatory requirement.
The total number of ampere-hours (Ah) that can be withdrawn from a fully charged battery under specific conditions is describing a regulatory requirement.

The decrease over time and upon usage in the amount of charge that a battery can deliver at the rated voltage, with respect to the original rated capacity declared by the manufacturer is describing a regulatory requirement.
Entity to bundle the internal resistance properties of a battery.
The resistance offered by the cell in the flow of the current
Total internal resistance in a battery pack is describing a regulatory requirement.
Increase in internal resistance of a battery pack over a period of time is describing a regulatory requirement.
Capacity threshold for exhaustion as percentage value is describing a regulatory requirement.
Entity to bundle the energy properties of a battery.
Maximum allowed battery energy (Wh) of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement.
Round-trip efficiency is the percentage of electricity put into storage is describing a regulatory requirement.
Round-trip efficiency is the percentage of electricity put into storage is describing a regulatory requirement.

aas:displayName.aas:langString: ratio maximum allowed battery power and maximum allowed battery energy

aas:description.aas:langString: Ratio between maximum allowed battery power (W) and battery energy (Wh) is describing a regulatory requirement.
Entity to bundle the characterisitics describing the physical dimensions
Length of the item is describing a business requirement.
Width of the item is describing a business requirement.
Height of the item is describing a business requirement.
Diameter of the item.
Weight of the item is describing a regulatory requirement.
Entity to bundle the characterisitics describing the state of a battery
Evidence/Certificate of the health evaluation of a battery for its use following repurposing or remanufacturing operations is describing a business requirement.
The value of the state of charge of the battery at the end of life i.e. when entering recycling scheme is describing a business requirement.
Status of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement. Value list provided by the regulators.
